title: How many words can you deliver in a day as a freelance content writer? - Quora

response.answer_text: It’s only a matter of content you are writing, if it’s about a subject you know well you can go way higher than the subject you have to research about it’ll cut into your time of writing plus you’ll have to cross-check what you wrote from time to time for fact checks and copyright issues. if you’re writing fictional and have an active imagination you can write up to 20 legal pages of not more.
